title.narrative: Rural Development: Support to Rural Development in North Lower Guinea Project

description.narrative: The general objective of the project is to sustainably improve the incomes, food security and living conditions of poor rural households in the North Lower Guinea region. Specific objectives are to: (a) strengthen the capacity of the target population and their organizations; and (b) increase agricultural (crops and livestock) productivity and diversify income sources in a sustainable manner.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Support to Rural Development in North Lower Guinea Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
